title: The Testament of Gideon Mack
author: Robertson, James
snippet: We were halfway through the Glack, with its woodedslopes running steeply down to the road on either side, before Irealised where we were.

title: The Testament of Gideon Mack
author: Robertson, James
snippet: The accident had happened ten miles from Monimaskit, on atwisty stretch of road known as the Glack.
